Articles.Content:
Just a small number on the corner or anywhere else so we know how many parts we've got.

If there is already a way to do that other than saving and checking the load tab, please tell me.

AFAIK, mechjeb's vessel information is the only way of knowing the part count when building.

Vessel info like Dv, TWR, mass... would be great as a stock mechanic.

Is number of parts actually important enough to take up UI real-estate? I personally can't think of a reason for the count other than, perhaps, for a measure of how much memory the craft takes up. Weight would be more relevant now, as would dV, followed by cost when that becomes relevant. Just sayin'
Flight Engineer Redux does all of the above, but I do think that some info about the size and weight of the rocket (especially the delta-V attainable) should be accessible in the stock game.

IMO it's a so simple feature that there is no reason for it to not be in the game.

It would help a lot in improving the rocket to achieve better part count performance and decrease lag.

Sometimes I start building and don't even figure out that I overkill on shape count for no reason.

Is number of parts actually important enough to take up UI real-estate? I personally can't think of a reason for the count other than, perhaps, for a measure of how much memory the craft takes up. Weight would be more relevant now, as would dV, followed by cost when that becomes relevant. Just sayin'

Part count is critical once you start getting into larger or more complex craft. Once you hit the lag threshold (which will vary for each machine), the part count pretty much tells you just how bad the lag is going to be. Seeing it easily while building would give advance warning that your craft is starting to head towards painful lag.

I do think that seeing some basic stats for your craft while building is probably close to the #1 missing editor feature, to be honest. It doesn't have to clutter the screen horribly, it can be a pull down type thing, similar to the stock resources panel, so entirely minimal UI space when you don't want to see it.

I agree this is important but a surely what would be more appropriate is memory usage rather than part count - some parts are more complex than others etc. I'm thinking about something like Spore, which had a complexity measure for creations.

Not that I'm really bothered either way TBH!

I believe vessel information (weight, dV, thrust, etc.) is on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest[/thread] list.

It's not a bad idea, but I believe it's one of those things that is pretty much certainly going to be added sooner or later. As such, I think this should be locked.
